DOC.brief_title: Individualized Fortification Breast Milk Preterm Infants - A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Birth weight ≤ 1500g gestational age < 32weeks Tolerating enteral intake ≥ 100 ml/kg/d ≥ 24h Infants feed 25 % mean caloric intake consecutive week formula milk gastrointestinal malformation , major congenital anomaly chromosomal abnormality Babies enterostoma short gut syndrome Fluid restriction Renal disease Sepsis Necrotizing enterocolitis Hepatic dysfunction
